filters_applied: Low severity: keep only if mapped to vulnerability type

findings.description:
LogFile (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_019.sol#65-89) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- History.push(LastMsg) (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_019.sol#86)

Reentrancy in PRIVATE_ETH_CELL.Collect(uint256) (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_019.sol#42-54):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_019.sol#48)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _am (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_019.sol#50)
	PRIVATE_ETH_CELL.balances (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_019.sol#6) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- PRIVATE_ETH_CELL.Collect(uint256) (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_019.sol#42-54)
	- PRIVATE_ETH_CELL.Deposit() (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_019.sol#34-40)
	- PRIVATE_ETH_CELL.balances (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_019.sol#6)
